tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    conversation_text TEXT,
    conversation_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    message_text TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE conversations (conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                     sender_id UUID,
                     message TEXT,
                     timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE social_media_conversations (
    conversation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    topic TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE trending_topics (
    topic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_name TEXT,
    mentions_count INTEGER,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    feedback TEXT,
    sentiment TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
